Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the to

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  Th

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon". I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon". I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknes

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon". The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more agressiv

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I discove

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almos

  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the man

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the mana within me protected me.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.

  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the mana within me protected me.   They seem to be vu

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the mana within me protected me.   They seem to be vulnerable to mana and mag

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon". The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the mana within me protected me.   They seem to be vulnerable to mana and magic.  I have made it my miss

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the mana within me protected me.   They seem to be vulnerable to mana and magic.  I have made it my mission to find others like m

  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the mana within me protected me.   They seem to be vulnerable to mana and magic.  I have made it my mission to find others like me so we can fight the "

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon". Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon". The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the mana within me protected me.   They seem to be vulnerable to mana and magic.  I have made it my mission to find others like me so we can fight the "Mlon".   I have found a few others like me, but they are not as strong as I am.   The more that we train the more confident that I fee

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the mana within me protected me.   They seem to be vulnerable to mana and magic.  I have made it my mission to find others like me so we can fight the "Mlon".   I have found a few others like me, but they are not as strong as I am.   The more that we train the more confident that I feel that we have a chance

  My family never taught me about how to use mana.   That is because I had no real contact with my family.  My parents  My only contact is old journals that were left to me when my parents died.  Through those journals, I have been able to learn how to wield mana.  We need this ancient power in order to fight back against the "Mlon".  The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the mana within me protected me.   They seem to be vulnerable to mana and magic.  I have made it my mission to find others like me so we can fight the "Mlon".   I have found a few others like me, but they are not as strong as I am. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.

The "Mlon" is an alien race that came to earth 10 years ago.  At first, they seemed peaceful.  They were certainly peaceful, but that was to analyze how strong we were.  Once they realized our weaknesses, they became much more aggressive.     


The "Mlon" are a race of insect-like creatures.  I almost was killed by one until I discovered that the mana within me protected me.   They seem to be vulnerable to mana and magic.  I have made it my mission to find others like me so we can fight the "Mlon".   I have found a few others like me, but they are not as strong as I am.   The more that we train the more confident that I feel that we have a chance in this fight.  The fight to protect earth

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.  

In a forgotten age, mana was the engine for humanities advancement.   It was used to power magic.  When people of today think "magic", they think of someone pulling a rabbit out of a hat.   I am talking about TRUE magic.   The ability to manipulate the elements, to fly, to teleport, to manipulate time and space.  All of these things were possible through the engine of magic.  Mana was the fuel for that engine.   My ancestors were once powerful wielders of magic.  For some reason, my family had been blessed with larger mana stores.  Our capacity to hold mana seemed to exceed the other people of the past.  


 am the last of my family.
